AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: conducted search, interviewed Saldana, and arranged for a K-9 unit to meet them
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, searched for registration documents in the truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Heather Vargas: participated in search, involved in providing information that led to the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: truck driver who was stopped by Deputy Cox, identified himself and stated he was not used to driving a truck with a trailer attached, has a history of arrests including drug smuggling, denied presence of dope during questioning, served 9 years in federal prison
